ThingDef.description: A severed feline vagina. Long and thin vagina with clittoris inside, perfect for barbed feline cocks.

ThingDef.label: crocodilian penis
ThingDef.description: A crocodilian penis. Very rigid and has a thick bulbous base, but otherwise similar to a humanoid penis.

ThingDef.label: udder
ThingDef.description: Large udder, possibly from muffalo or some similar animal. Intended to be used as animal prosthetics, but may be attached to humanoids for literal cowgirl look.
